Sentencas: The effect of a short circuit fault and a voltage sag fault on a distributed grid-connected solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is investigated in this paper.
Titulo: Analysis of a Distributed Grid-Connected Fuel Cell During Fault Conditions

Sentencas: The fuel cell is modeled in Simulink and the performance is verified against experimental load testing data.
Titulo: Analysis of a Distributed Grid-Connected Fuel Cell During Fault Conditions

Sentencas: Grid faults are simulated, and conclusions are drawn on the fuel cell response and the effects of the fault condition on internal fuel cell parameters.
Titulo: Analysis of a Distributed Grid-Connected Fuel Cell During Fault Conditions
